name: Through Ashenville
description:
Through Ashenville is a point and click adventure game. The main character, Will’s grandmother passes away and she wants to go to her hometown Shellburn for the funeral. When she arrives at the bus station too late to buy a ticket to, the nice old lady that works at the station makes an offer to her. She can drop Will at Shellburn, but they have to go to Ashenville first. This dark, dirty and mysterious town intrigues Will; and when she learns they cannot leave the town until sunrise, she decides to spend her last hours on this creepy town by investigating the uncanny things going on around the place.

How to Play:

To Move: Click towards the area you want to go to.

To Interact: Click on the objects or characters you want to interact with.
